description:
Provides a Bitbucket repository resource.

This resource allows you manage your repositories such as scm type, if it is
private, how to fork the repository and other options.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Description.description: What the description of the repo is.

ForkPolicy.description:
What the fork policy should be. Defaults to
allow_forks.

HasIssues.description: If this should have issues turned on or not.

HasWiki.description: If this should have wiki turned on or not.

IsPrivate.description: If this should be private or not. Defaults to `true`.

Language.description: What the language of this repository should be.

Owner.description:
The owner of this repository. Can be you or any team you
have write access to.

PipelinesEnabled.description: Turn on to enable pipelines support.

ProjectKey.description:
If you want to have this repo associated with a
project.

Scm.description:
What SCM you want to use. Valid options are hg or git.
Defaults to git.

Website.description: URL of website associated with this repository.
